column1: Kata Robata////My parents used to take me here a lot when I was younger
column2: but then we eventually stopped coming for some reason. We were around the area and decided to stop by for some of my favorite food
column3: raw fish! When we walked in
column4: we were surprised to see that there was no wait and we decided to sit at the sushi bar. When sitting up there
column5: the chefs are very nice to you
column6: and it is fascinating to see them cut the fish right in front of you. You can also see how fresh the fish is
